projects.name: Noor Alhuda
projects.description: Religious platform built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, offering the Holy Qur’an, morning/evening duas, and Qur’an audio streaming. Implemented Google sign-in with NextAuth, a Community section for publishing articles with internal and external sharing to promote Islamic knowledge, and an FAQ section supporting user questions.

projects.name: XIV Fashion Store
projects.description: Premium e-commerce platform built with Next.js 15 and TypeScript, featuring a minimalist design and interactive animations with Framer Motion. Implemented API routes with MongoDB for authentication and used NextAuth for Google sign-in. Built dynamic product filtering for a seamless luxury shopping experience.

projects.name: Installment Management System
projects.description: A specialized system for managing product installments. It allows users to create installment plans, track customer payments, and manage guarantor details. The dashboard provides comprehensive analytics including total customers, active installments, and remaining balances.

projects.name: First Clean
projects.description: Bilingual (Arabic/English) web app for a cleaning business, built with React.js, Tailwind CSS, Axios, i18n, and Features a clean, elegant UI, allowing clients to browse services, place and track orders, and an admin dashboard for managing services and requests with authentication and dynamic language switching

projects.name: Publish House
projects.description: Noor Al-Huda is a religious platform offering the Holy Qur’an, morning/evening duas, and Qur’an audio playback. It includes a Community section for publishing articles and an FAQ section for sharing questions and answers. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Top Sport Gym
projects.description: A TOP_SPORT_GYM website where users register and log in to their profile page. From there, they can check if they are subscribed or not, view the start and end dates of their subscription, and see their personal ID. For the admin, they can check if a user is subscribed by entering their ID. The admin can also add a new subscription for the user

projects.name: TeamZone
projects.description: A court booking site where players need wallet credit to request money via Vodafone Cash, and admin approval is required. Once approved, they can book the court. In the My Bookings page, the reserved court appears. Players can rate others after the match. The entire team books the same court and rates each other, with the highest ratings shown on the Ratings page
